hardSkills.name: React

hardSkills.details: Proficient in CI/CD, Git (GitHub/Bitbucket), and Agile, I streamline software development with automated processes, ensuring rapid delivery of high-quality code.

hardSkills.details: To power my applications, Supabase and MySQL are my go-to solutions. With Supabase's flexibility and MySQL's reliability, I ensure seamless support for all my projects.

hardSkills.details: Exploring the art of crafting user-centric designs, aiming to create intuitive interfaces that enhance the user experience.

softSkills.details: I easily pivot to meet new challenges and embrace change with enthusiasm. Whether it's adjusting to new technologies or shifting project priorities, I thrive in dynamic environments, bringing versatility and resilience to every task.

softSkills.name: Fast Learner
softSkills.details: A fast learner, I quickly absorb new concepts and technologies, adapting them to solve problems and drive projects forward. With a curious mindset and a hunger for knowledge, I'm always eager to explore new ideas and expand my skills.

softSkills.name: Attentive To Details
softSkills.details: I meticulously ensure that every aspect of a project is meticulously crafted. From pixel-perfect designs to error-free code, I prioritize precision in every task, enhancing the overall quality and user experience.

softSkills.name: Analytical Thinking
softSkills.details: Analytical by nature, I dissect problems to uncover insights and devise strategic solutions that drive projects forward.

softSkills.name: Highly Organized
softSkills.details: Highly organized and a lover of to-do lists, I thrive on structure and efficiency. With meticulous planning and prioritization, I ensure tasks are completed with precision and deadlines are met with ease.

softSkills.name: Team Oriented
